game.title: The Lost Treasure Quest
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure of Captain Jack's adventures
game.description: A challenging quest for seekers: follow clues, unravel puzzles, and overcome obstacles to find the long-lost chest. Beware of dangers and outsmart the enemies you'll encounter along the way!
game.reward: Certificates of bravery and a hoard of precious artifacts

task.description: Unriddle the cryptic symbols on this map to reveal the next clue. The Map Room awaits your deciphering skills.

task.objective: Unlock the secret chest with the ancient key
task.description: A hidden chamber holds the key to access the treasure. Explore the ruins and uncover its location for the key.

task.objective: Prove your worth to the pirate's ghost guard
task.description: The guardians of the treasure room have a challenge in store. Face their trials and earn their approval for access.
Claim your reward by exploring the treasure room, but be ready to outsmart any traps that stand in your way.
